title: Google to invest $15 billion in AI data center capacity in India
description: BENGALURU — Google will invest $15 billion over the next five years to set up data center capacity for an artificial intelligence (AI) hub in India’s Andhra Pradesh, the company said on Tuesday, marking one of its biggest-ever investments in the country.

title: Global smartphone shipments rise in Q3 on AI-driven upgrades
description: GLOBAL smartphone shipments grew 2.6 percent in the third quarter (Q3) this year, fueled by strong consumer demand for premium and artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled devices, according to preliminary data from the International Data Corp. on Monday.
content: GLOBAL smartphone shipments grew 2.6 percent in the third quarter (Q3) this year, fueled by strong consumer demand for premium and artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled devices, according to preliminary data from the International Data Corp. on Monday... [1434 chars]

title: OpenAI partners with Broadcom to design its own AI chips
description: OPENAI said on Monday it is working with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own artificial intelligence (AI) computer chips.
content:
OPENAI said on Monday it is working with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own artificial intelligence (AI) computer chips.

title: AI Plus becomes China's new magnet for global capital
description: CHONGQING — Chongqing Municipality, an important industrial manufacturing base in southwest China, has recently turned into a showroom for the deepened integration of artificial intelligence (AI) technology and traditional industries.
content:

title: Sci-fi horror ‘The Marianas Web’ warns of digital obsession
description: Filipino-Italian actor and director Ruben Soriquez stars in “The Marianas Web,” a psychological sci-fi horror film that opens in Philippine cinemas today. Distributed by Crystalsky Entertainment, the movie explores the dark consequences of losing human connection in an age of virtual reality and artificial intelligence.

title: Citigroup's AI usage frees up 100,000 hours for developers a week
description: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser said the company's use of artificial intelligence has saved time and allowed it to free up 100,000 hours of weekly capacity for software developers.

title: You’ll soon to be able to shop for Walmart on ChatGPT
description: Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to let users browse and make purchases through the artificial intelligence
content:
Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to let users browse and make purchases directly through its popular chatbot ChatGPT, as the world’s largest retailer looks to use AI to leapfrog rival Amazon in online shopping.

title: Foundations want to curb AI developers' influence with $500 million aimed at centering human needs
description: Ten philanthropic foundations are committing $500 million across the next five years to place human interests at the forefront of artificial intelligence's rapid integration into daily life.
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Artificial intelligence is design — not destiny.
